PreceptDef.label: desired
PreceptDef.description: It’s a simple-minded claim that this planet doesn’t have exotic and beautiful lands to appreciate and immerse oneself in. Traveling this world should be a priority.

li.label: traveled the world
li.description: There is nothing as exhilarating as seeing what the world has to offer.

li.label: traveled the world
li.description: Travelling is amazing. Seeing the sights, discovering new lands... The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind.

li.label: traveled the world
li.description: It's been a few days since I travelled. I loved it.

li.label: traveled the world
li.description: I have a fond memory of my past travels.

PreceptDef.label: despised
PreceptDef.description: Every moment spent away from home is another moment running away from the inevitable. Time spent traveling can be spent more wisely at home building and defending it.

li.label: had to leave the colony
li.description: I despise travelling. Leaving the security of our colony is terrible.

li.label: had to leave the colony
li.description: The memories of my last travels are still fresh in my mind. I hated it.

li.label: had to leave the colony
li.description: It's been a few days since I travelled. I hated it.

li.label: had to leave the colony
li.description: I have uncomfortable memories of my past travels.
